Articles.Content:
I deorbited randomly, and I managed to come in right down near the Jeb-Un Somethingorother monument. (It does have a name, try crashing into it or installing RealSolarSystem and crash into it in deep space)

![7S9kJGT.png](http://i.imgur.com/7S9kJGT.png)

It's a crappy Planet Express Ship, incidentally. And it didn't exactly land successfully. I guess I should probably harvest some stem cells from adults that I killed and put the Kerbals' dead heads in a vat full of placenta or something.

The desert temple thingy majig?

Nice PE ship, though... Maybe parachutes for landing?
Yeah, Pyramids GregroxMun, is that a "lawn dart" I see there? Out of fuel?

> 
> Yeah, Pyramids GregroxMun, is that a "lawn dart" I see there? Out of fuel?

Its engine is obviously malfunctioning. Otherwise it would just easily rotate the universe a bit and then draw it slowly upwards, until the planet was touching the landing legs/gear comfortably. That or Zoidberg decided to take the pilot's seat for a second. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

It's a pretty great easter egg isn't it?

I hyperedited a mini plane to it and had lots of fun flying around it.
what mod gives you those top readouts?

> 
> what mod gives you those top readouts?

Kerbal Engineer Redux
